courses.subject: Choose One
courses.customDesc:
Choose one of the following: TH225 or TH230.

Both TH225 and TH230 are required for the degree.

courses.subject: GE
courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed; A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D shuold be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

courses.subject: Choose One
courses.customDesc: Choose one of the following: TH227 or TH228.

courses.subject: Choose Four
courses.customDesc:
Choose four Lower-Division Theatre courses: TH215, TH235, TH240, TH245, TH255, TH256, TH260, TH265, TH270, TH275, TH280, TH285.

If not used to meet major core requirements, may be used to meet other major electives. See catalog.

Repeatable courses may be taken twice: TH275, TH305, TH325, TH330, TH400, TH470, TH471, TH480.Topic course can be taken with different topics to meet major electives as well as major core requirements: TH305.

courses.subject: Graduation Writing Requirement
courses.customDesc: Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

courses.subject: Choose Four
courses.customDesc:

courses.subject: Upper Division Free Elective
courses.customDesc:
Any Upper Division Free Elective course can go here.

At least 4 units of Free Electives must be Upper Division (300-400 level) to meet graduation requirements.
